articles.author: Morgan Little
articles.title: iPhone 16, Apple Intelligence, AirPods 4 and more: Everything revealed at Apple Event 2024 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple’s biggest event of the year brings new iPhones, AI updates and other hardware.
articles.content: Apples biggest event of the year has arrived, and with it, the iPhone 16 lineup and a slew of AI-related updates for iOS 18. Apple Intelligence was the star of the Apple event this year, like it was … [+9160 chars]
